author: PTI
title: Italy urgently seeks safe exit from punishing lockdown
description: Nearly 12,500 people have died of the virus so far according to official data
content:
Italys coronavirus epidemic may be slowing, but critics warn the government is falling seriously behind on strategies to lift the punishing nationwide lockdown and reboot the economy.
